Entry.Name: Insecure Connection
Entry.Description: By using the HTTP schema, a malicious user may force the app to fetch unsecure content. This can lead to wrong information being displayed (e.g., phishing attacks).

Mitigation.Textual: Replace all the occurrencies of 'http://' with 'https://' in the requests performed by the application.
Mitigation.Code Snippet:
1. Open an IDE (e.g., Android Studio);
2. Find and replace all the 'http://' occurrencies with 'https://'.
